skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hanuman chalisa
Developer Terms of Use
des:
There is no better beginning of the day than listening to ‘Hanuman Chalisa’. The epic lyrics of ‘Hanuman Chalisa’ miraculously dissolves nectar in your mind giving divine soothe. It purges all negativity and unwanted fears from your mind. 

Regular listening to ‘Hanuman Chalisa’ keeps you away from the evil influence and bad omen. ‘Hanuman Chalisa’ musically narrates lord Hanuman’s inspiring character and his incredible devotion for Lord Rama. Listening to ‘Hanuman Chalisa’ gives positive vibes and creates a divine aura around you. 

The sacred recite of ‘Hanuman Chalisa’ connects you with centuries old ‘Ramayana’. Do not miss the opportunity to give divine experience to your soul. Undoubtedly, ‘Hanuman Chalisa’ connects you to supreme power and subsequently you will be a fearless person.

Now you can add this ‘Hanuman Chalisa’ Skill to your daily routine list.

Song credits : Aravind Bhat Nempu (Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0hLplC1JASVg4GxnNXJKvA)
